author: Special Correspondent
text:
Southern Railway will be operating a special train (No. 06181) from Chennai Egmore to Tirunelveli via Chidambaram, Thanjavur, Tiruchi and Madurai on Monday, January 25, to clear the extra rush of passengers. It will leave Chennai Egmore at 10.45 p.m. In the return direction, the train (No. 00642) will leave Tirunelveli on Tuesday, January 26, at 6.20 p.m. Advance reservations are open.

Changes in train services

Due to line block to speed up engineering works on Chennai Central-Gudur section, a few services on January 21, 23, 25, 28 and 30; February 2, 4, 6, 9, 11, 13, 16, 18, 20, 23, 25 and 27 and March 1, 3, 5, 8, 10 and 12 have been changed.

Train No.42601 from Beach-Gummidipundi and train nos. 42015/17 and 42019 from MMC to Gummidipundi will be terminated at Ennore and sent back to Beach and MMC respectively. Train No. 42021 from Gummidipoondi to MMC will be turned back at Minjur. Train nos. 42020/22 and 42026 from Gummidipoondi to MMC will be turned back at Minjur. Train nos. 42406 and 42408 from Sulurpeta to MMC will be turned back at Minjur to Gummidipoondi. Train no. 42024 from Gummidipoondi to MMC will turn back at Minjur to Sulurpeta. Train no. 66026 from Sulurpeta to MMC will turn back at Ponneri to Sulurpeta. Train no. 42030 from Gummidipundi for MMC at 3.15 is cancelled.
title: Additional train to Tirunelveli to clear rush
